sellerCard.description:
Welcome to Softflux Development Services!

Are you ready to elevate your business with cutting-edge digital solutions? Look no further! I'm Softflux Development, your one-stop destination for all your web and software development needs.
1- Web Development
2- Mobile Application development (Android and IOS)
3- CRM, SAAS, Products
4- Prototyping (UI/UX)
5- Desktop Software (POS/AI)
6- Graphic
 Why choose Softflux Development?
1- Expertise
2- Collaboration
3- Quality Assurance
4- Support

Ready to take your business to the next level? Let's discuss your project requirements, Contact with me !

description.content:
Web development isn't merely about utilizing technologies to create your website, application, or tool. What's truly crucial is developing a website without bugs/errors and ensuring optimal performance, especially during high traffic influxes.

Hello! I'm Softflux Development. We specialize in bringing your vision to life. With a team of over 26 developers, we work diligently and professionally, as evidenced by our reviews. Our services encompass:

Technologies:

  • Full Stack
  • React JS
  • JavaScript
  • HTML/CSS
  • WordPress/Plugins
  • PHP
  • Laravel
  • ASP.NET
  • Customization

Databases:

  • MongoDB
  • AWS
  • Cloud-based
  • Firebase
  • SQL

APIs:

  • RESTful APIs
  • Direct APIs

Testing:

  • API testing
  • Unit testing
  • Analytical testing
  • Database testing
  • Performance testing
  • Reusability testing
  • Overview testing
  • Response testing
  • Selenium tool testing

Our commitment is to deliver projects that are 100% correct and complete. Additionally, we offer ongoing support for any future edits or customizations. Many of our clients from ten years ago still seek our services due to our exceptional performance.

ACTION:

If you're ready to elevate your business, place your order now. Feel free to reach out to me directly if you have any questions. Thanks

openGraph.title: build your website saas and mobile app development

reviews.comment: Softflux delivered a solid software development project, but there was room for closer alignment with my expectations. While the cooperation was good overall, there could be improvements in the level of effort and collaboration.

After several failed attempts to communicate our requirement successfully with other software developers I was skeptical. However, from start to finish, Kamran and Sinan have been utterly professional and totally understood the project without hesitation. In fact, using their expertise they improved it. Highly recommend and thank you Team!

seller_response.comment: It's my pleasure to work with you and i hope so we will continue it.

reviews.comment: I made the best decision with choosing to work with Softlux! Kamran and his team are truly the best. I'm very big on detail and design aesthetics, and there was no issue with any changes I've wanted; they will work with you to ensure the project is completed exactly to your liking. I do want to highlight how patient they've been with me - it's the best feeling working with someone who doesn't make you feel like you're annoying for wanting something done a specific way.

seller_response.comment: it’s my pleasure and i will try my best to give you best work ASAP

reviews.comment: Honestly started off the project not really knowing what to expect, by the end process we became brothers. Very friendly goes above and beyond and understands what you need
